EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Honeywell ATR Operators Conference in China
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You're now registered for Honeywell Aerospace's upcoming event. Here are the details you'll need:
Event: Honeywell ATR Operators Conference in China Date: October 23-24 {{my.HOC China:default=edit me}}Location: Renaissance Haikou Hotel No 39 Yangshan Boulevard, Longhua District Haikou Hainan 571155 China Reserve your room <[[https://www.marriott.com/meeting-event-hotels/group-corporate-travel/groupCorp.mi?resLinkData=Honeywell%20group%20%5EHAKMH%60A96A96A%7CA96A96B%60471.70%60CNY%60false%602%6010/17/18%6010/29/18%6010/12/18&app=resvlink&stop_mobi=yes&mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTnpRNE1UWXlPVEk1WTJZMiIsInQiOiJwaDlRcjF6dTQ2UGZUTG1NZzh2SG5TenhFS3psRW5ueVVvTkYyeVc5OVJ3d1lzcXdOWGdcL0hDZVQ3Z3VFYnR4aWwyRjNKSEhJRTZNWUFJRG9pMW04OHc9PSJ9]]>
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201810_HOC_APAC.html]]> to view the agenda.
Please contact christopher.vandeleur@honeywell.com <[[mailto:christopher.vandeleur@honeywell.com]]> with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
